title: Ticket #5576: Campus Factory glideins do not detect correct HOME
description: The blahp redefines the HOME variable before executing a job. The Campus Factory glideins require ~/ to resolve to the home directory. Fix the glidein_wrapper.sh file to correctly eval ~/
